Desc: This system lets users report errors, enabling admins to review and correct information, ensuring data accuracy.
Details: This system allows users to report errors in the data, enabling administrators to review and correct inaccuracies. This feedback loop ensures data remains accurate and reliable while fostering user trust and improving overall data quality. Additionally, it promotes continuous improvement by encouraging user engagement.

Desc: This system manages art facility reservations with image uploads, search, maps, pagination, and admin controls for users and statuses.
Details: This system manages art facility reservations with features like image uploads, advanced search, interactive maps, and paginated listings. It also includes comprehensive admin controls for managing users, reservation statuses, and facility details, ensuring an efficient and user-friendly experience.

Desc: This Christmas webpage features interactive snowflake animations, festive decorations, a sprite background, and ambient holiday music.
Details: This Christmas webpage features interactive snowflake animations, festive decorations, a sprite-based background, and ambient holiday music to create a magical festive experience. It engages users with a cheerful and immersive holiday atmosphere.

Desc: EasyParking is a parking management system using HTML, JavaScript, and CSS. It features self-parking, vehicle search, and parking lot status monitoring.
Details: EasyParking is a parking management system built with HTML, JavaScript, and CSS, designed to streamline parking operations. It includes features such as self-parking assistance, vehicle search functionality, and real-time parking lot status monitoring. The system enhances user convenience and improves parking efficiency.

Desc: An Employee Management System where admins assign role-based access permissions, manage new hire data entry, and oversee an approval workflow for employee records.
Details: This PHP-based Employee Management System features role-based access, inline editing, modal forms, and pagination. Admins can filter views and manage approvals with reject+comment tracking. The system logs creators, approvers, timestamps, and streamlines new hire onboarding.

Desc: A powerful platform for Product Managers to plan, validate, and deliver features—driven by insights, collaboration, and flexible pricing.
Details: A Webflow-powered loading page tailored for Product Managers—featuring interactive carousels, animated scroll, and multi-image sliders to highlight roadmap planning, feature validation, and team alignment. Designed for clarity, engagement, and seamless collaboration.

Desc: This app, built with Entity Framework, enables movie ticket booking, movie management, and efficient ticket sales.
Details: This application, developed using Entity Framework, facilitates seamless movie ticket booking and management. It provides features for managing movies, tracking ticket sales, and ensuring an efficient and user-friendly experience for both customers and administrators.

Desc: This project lets users manage movies, tickets, reviews, and tags. Viewers can buy tickets, rate movies, and submit reviews, while admins oversee data.
Details: This project enables comprehensive management of movies, tickets, reviews, and tags. Viewers can purchase tickets, rate movies, and submit reviews, enhancing user engagement. Administrators have control over all data, ensuring smooth operation and maintaining data integrity.

Desc: Quirky Directory lets students upload projects and teachers manage students and assignments, ensuring smooth tracking via an intuitive interface.
Details: Quirky Directory is a dynamic platform where students can upload their projects, and teachers efficiently manage students and assignments. It features an intuitive interface for seamless tracking, fostering better collaboration and organization in academic environments.

Desc: A backend API system for RSI, enabling admins to manage and update product data in real-time with seamless frontend synchronization.
Details: RSI's API management system enables real-time product data updates via inline editing and modal forms. Featuring CRUD operations and Vercel deployment, it ensures instant frontend sync without delays or freezes.

Desc: This is a website developed for the family business RSI, with a frontend powered by Next.js, and enhanced by the ShadCN library.
Details: This website features interactive elements such as Google Maps integration, verticle timeline, flip cards, and a carousel showcasing both videos and images. A dark mode toggle enhances user experience across devices. The site creatively connects RSI’s two distinct products—dog treats and carpets, through a unified theme of health, comfort, and nature.

Desc: Reading Space is a book management platform with features like search, bookmarks, text-to-audio, and ebook previews. Admins manage users and books for a seamless experience.
Details: Reading Space is a book management platform offering features like search, bookmarks, text-to-audio, and ebook previews. Users can explore and manage their reading material, while admins handle book and user management. The platform provides an intuitive and accessible experience for readers, enhancing engagement and organization.

Desc: The blog uses HTML and CSS, offering a simple, accessible design for an optimal reading experience and valuable content.
Details: This blog, built with HTML and pure CSS, features various font styles, attractive typography, and well-organized text-image layouts. It provides a clean and beautiful design for optimal readability.

Desc: A streamlined Snakebite daily case data management platform with essential Excel-like functionality.
Details: A streamlined data system with Excel-like functions including search, filters, and column sorting. Supports seamless data import/export and responsive viewing across devices. Real-time sync ensures data integrity for medical case tracking.

Desc: This React To-Do App organizes tasks by status, urgency, type, and due dates with color-coded categories for quick recognition. Users can easily add and manage tasks efficiently.
Details: This React-based To-Do List Management App helps users organize tasks with ease. Tasks are visually categorized by status, urgency, type, and due dates, using distinct colors for quick recognition. Users can effortlessly add new tasks and manage their priorities, ensuring an intuitive and efficient experience.

Desc: A React-based quiz app that uses the Trivia API to provide users with over 20 categories of trivia questions for an interactive and fun experience.
Details: This React-based quiz app utilizes the Trivia API to offer users a wide variety of over 20 trivia categories. It provides an interactive and engaging experience, allowing users to test their knowledge across multiple topics. The app features a user-friendly interface, real-time question loading, and instant feedback, making it both fun and educational.

Desc: An interactive Weather Broadcast app displaying real-time forecasts with customizable features.
Details: This app features a chart dashboard for visual weather trends and a detailed data table for precise metrics. Users can personalize voice alerts and enable looped broadcasts for continuous updates. Designed for accessibility, it ensures real-time accuracy while offering both graphical and tabular weather insights.

Desc: This project lets users post emoji wishes in Firebase, displayed dynamically with animations, featuring Firebase setup, input handling, and rendering.
Details: This project lets users post emoji wishes, stored in Firebase and displayed dynamically with animations. It includes Firebase setup for real-time data storage, input handling for submissions, and automatic rendering of wishes. The animations enhance the interactive experience, making it engaging and visually appealing.

Desc: A WordPress portfolio using a child theme for styling, with custom navigation and footer.
Details: This WordPress portfolio features a custom login page and uses PHP to create unique header/footer templates. Project data is dynamically loaded via JSON, ensuring easy updates. Additionally, shortcodes simplify form integration for user interactions.
